page.title: 06A SUPERSTORE
page.content: The Asda is a superstore.This means that it is a place that sells food, clothing, electrical goods,gardening items and many other things. This is so that people can do all their shopping under one roof. The store 1s built in Carcroft as it is that firms policy to build just outside major towns, and it is near to the A1 making it accessible to a large number of people.It was built in 1974 and modernised and extended in 1984. It employs about 300 people and about 80 of them live in Carcroft or Skellow.Others live in Woodlands, Sprotborough, Arksey,Bentley and Campsall.
